summary: An FBI letter to USCIS regarding an individual cooperating in the federal investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The letter confirms the individual's return to the U.S. on February 15, 2021, after a brief departure, and her continued cooperation with the investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject of the federal investigation in which the cooperating individual is involved.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of the federal investigation in which the cooperating individual is involved.

persons.name: Erica Dubno
persons.context: Identified as counsel who informed the FBI office of the cooperating individual's intent to depart the U.S. briefly in connection with an E-2 visa.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects of the same federal investigation, indicating their alleged involvement in related criminal activity.

events.title: Counsel informs FBI of planned departure
events.description: Erica Dubno, counsel for a cooperating individual, informs the FBI office of the individual's intent to depart the U.S. briefly in connection with an E-2 visa.

events.title: Cooperating individual returns to U.S.
events.description: The cooperating individual returns to the United States and resumes her cooperation in the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 26 Federal Plaza, New York, New York 10278
keyFacts: The FBI confirms an individual is cooperating in the federal investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The cooperating individual briefly departed the U.S. in February 2021 but returned on February 15, 2021, and resumed cooperation.
The individual's counsel, Erica Dubno, communicated with the FBI regarding the departure related to an E-2 visa.
The letter is addressed to USCIS's Humanitarian Division, suggesting the individual may be seeking or involved in a humanitarian immigration benefit.
The document indicates the FBI investigation into Epstein and Maxwell was ongoing as of August 2022.
